languages.text: "Рада слышать". {n}Арджента кивает и переводит взгляд на вас.{/n}
"I am glad to hear it." {n}Argenta nods and looks back at you.{/n}

languages.text: 「それが聞けて嬉しい」{n}アルジェンタは頷いてあなたを見返した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am glad to hear it." {n}Argenta nods and looks back at you.{/n}

languages.text: “很高兴听你这么说。”{n}阿洁塔点了点头，回过头看着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am glad to hear it." {n}Argenta nods and looks back at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “很高兴听你这么说。”{n}阿洁塔点了点头，回过头看着你。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Ravie de vous l'entendre dire. » {n}Argenta opine du chef et se retourne vers vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am glad to hear it." {n}Argenta nods and looks back at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ravie de vous l'entendre dire. » {n}Argenta opine du chef et se retourne vers vous.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Me alegra oírlo». {n}Argenta asiente y te vuelve a mirar.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am glad to hear it." {n}Argenta nods and looks back at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Me alegra oírlo». {n}Argenta asiente y te vuelve a mirar.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Es freut mich, das zu hören." {n}Argenta nickt und wendet den Blick wieder dir zu.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am glad to hear it." {n}Argenta nods and looks back at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Es freut mich, das zu hören." {n}Argenta nickt und wendet den Blick wieder dir zu.{/n}

languages.text: "Bunu duyduğuma sevindim." {n}Argenta, başıyla onayladıktan sonra bakışlarını sana çeviriyor.{/n}
